Description: Up for sale/auction is a beautiful Trans Black Satin Burst Schecter KM-7 MK I. Flame Maple Top, Super thin and fast neck, Ebony Fretboard, Offset Inlays, Tusq Nut, Locking Tuners, Hipshot Bridge with Duncan Sentient and Nazgul pickups. The guitar is in great condition, with normal play wear. There is some light patina on the pick up covers that does not affect the sound or playability whatsoever; and as seen in the pics, the bridge pickup cover coating has been worn off on the edges, again not affecting the sound or playability. Includes hardshell case and free shipping. Demos: soundcloud.com/arcaudioproductions/sets/schecter-km7-demos Info From Schecter: Keith Merrow KM-7 Trans Black Burst Satin (TBBS) SKU #237 SPECS: General Model Name: Keith Merrow KM-7 Item Number: 237 Country of Origin: South Korea Guitar Color: Trans Black Burst Satin (TBBS) Neck Fretboard: Ebony Neck Material: Maple 3-pc w/ Carbon Fiber Reinforcement Rods Inlays: Offset/Reverse Dots Side Dot Markers: Glow In The Dark Scale: 26.5” (673mm) Neck Shape: Ultra Thin ‘C’ Thickness: @ 1st Fret- .748” (19mm)/ @ 12th Fret- .787” (20mm) Frets: 24 X-Jumbo Stainless Steel Fretboard Radius: 12”-16” Compound Radius Nut: Graph Tech XL Black Tusq Nut Width: 1.889” (48mm) Tuners: Schecter Locking Truss Rod: 2-Way Adjustable Rod w/ 5/32” (4mm) Allen Nut Body: Top Contour: Arched Top Dexterity: Right Handed Construction: Set-Neck w/Ultra Access Body Material: Swamp Ash Top Material: Flamed Maple Binding: Black Multi-ply Bridge: Hipshot Hardtail (.125) w/ String Thru Body Electronics: Bridge Pickup: Seymour Ducan Nazgul Neck Pickup: Seymour Duncan Sentient Controls: Volume (Push-Pull)/3-Way Switch
Title: Schecter KM-7 MK I
